title: Best of the Program | Guests: Ryan Walters & Stephanie Elad | 4/21/22
description:
Glenn starts the show by going over his latest Wednesday night special discussing the grooming that’s happening to children in schools. Stephanie Elad joins Glenn to discuss her run for the school board after seeing her children's curriculum. Ryan Walters, Oklahoma’s secretary of education, joins to discuss the Stillwater, Oklahoma, school district bathroom policy.
